title: How did this work?
body: ranked 5s team we mixture of silver - diamond. we won 4/5 games with all our games being high Kills over deaths, we managed 2 pentas aswel and no deaths 2 games. We did awesome but got ranked silver 4? how did that work out?

replies.body: Team ranked has a much lower entry rank than solo queue from what ive seen. Kinda makes sense anyway, if you could get a good rank from just going 5-0 people would just keep making new teams til they did well in placements

Because your ranked is based on the combined MMR's for your TEAM RANKED MMR. not based on your own individual ranked MMR's.

Team ranked and Ranked Solo/Duo have seperate MMR's just like Normal's and Ranked does.
ok i understand that but how come we got put into a low teir and we pretty much won all our games
You won 4 lost 1 and got silver 4, meaning someone on your team has probably played team ranked before.
oh fair enough, now i understand thank you
